panels.description: Shows if the instance is a primary or replica
panels.title: Instance Status

panels.description: Buffer cache efficiency. Below 95% indicates excessive disk I/O - consider increasing shared_buffers or optimizing queries. Below 90% is critical.
panels.title: Cache Hit Ratio

panels.description: Age of databases since last vacuum
panels.title: Database Age (Transaction ID Wraparound)

panels.description: Multixact age of databases since last vacuum
panels.title: Database Age (MultiXact ID Wraparound)

panels.description: Total metric queries executed since pgexporter started
panels.title: Total Query Executions

panels.description: Total metric queries that timed out
panels.title: Total Query Timeouts

panels.description: Top 10 slowest queries by total execution time. Yellow (>100ms) indicates optimization candidates. Red (>1s) requires immediate attention. Requires pg_stat_statements extension.
panels.title: Slowest Queries

panels.description: PostgreSQL I/O operations by backend type (PostgreSQL 16+)
panels.title: I/O Operations by Backend Type

panels.description: PostgreSQL backend memory allocation by context. High 'Used' values in specific contexts may indicate memory leaks or inefficient queries. Available in PostgreSQL 14+.
panels.title: Memory Usage by Context

title: PostgreSQL 18 Performance Dashboard - pgexporter
description: PostgreSQL 18 monitoring dashboard using pgexporter metrics. Includes system health, performance indicators, replication status, and I/O statistics.
